channel.title: LSE:DRX on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in LSE:DRX on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Drax Slumps on UK Probe Into Controversial Biomass Sourcing
item.description: Drax Group Plc fell the most in more than two years in London trading after saying it’s facing a probe by the UK’s Financial Conduct Authority.
